name: Strawberry-Orange
preparation_steps: 1. Add all ingredients to a blender.
2. Process until the mixture is completely smooth.
3. If the smoothie is too thick, add additional milk
4. Pour and serve immediately.

name: Blueberry-Mango
preparation_steps: 1. Add all ingredients to a blender.
2. Process until the mixture is completely smooth.
3. If the smoothie is too thick, add additional milk.
4. Pour and serve immediately.

name: Avocado-Coconut
preparation_steps: 1. In a food processor or blender, process all the ingredients until smooth.

name: Blueberry
preparation_steps: 1. In a food processor or blender, process all the ingredients until smooth, about 1 to 2 minutes, stopping to scrape down the mixture if necessary.
2. Pour into glasses.

name: Peanut Butter
preparation_steps: 1. Put all of the ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth.

name: Berry-Beet
preparation_steps: 1. Put the berries, 1/2 cup cold water, beet, lemon juice, honey and coconut oil into a blender.
2. Blend on high until smooth, turning off the blender and pushing down on the ingredients with a spatula or wooden spoon as needed to help the blending process.
3. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons more water if needed to adjust consistency.

name: Watermelon-Cucumber
preparation_steps: 1. Put the cucumber, buttermilk, honey if using and lime juice into a blender.
2. Blend on high until smooth.

3. Add half of the frozen watermelon and blend until almost completely smooth, turning off the blender and pushing down on the ingredients with a spatula or wooden spoon as needed to help the blending process.
4. Add the remaining frozen watermelon and continue to blend until smooth. 5. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water if needed to adjust consistency. 6. Pour into a glass and garnish with a cucumber slice.

name: Tomato-Watermelon
preparation_steps: 1. Blend ingredients in a blender until smooth.
2. Pour into a glass and garnish with a watermelon wedge.

name: Lime-in-the-Coconut
preparation_steps: 1. Blend ingredients in a blender until smooth.
2. Pour into a glass and garnish with an umbrella straw.

name: Carrot
preparation_steps: 1. In a covered small saucepan, cook carrots in a small amount of boiling water about 15 minutes or until very tender.
2. Drain well.
3. Cool.
4. Place drained carrots in a blender.
5. Add orange juice.
6. Cover and blend until smooth.
7. Add ice cubes; cover and blend until smooth.
8. Pour into glasses.
